name: magnanimously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is kind and generous, especially towards an enemy or someone you have defeated: "The best man won", he said, magnanimously conceding defeat. Expecting a request for an autograph, the author beamed magnanimously. See
magnanimous
More examplesFewer examplesIt was easy for the victors to behave magnanimously.He was able to defuse the tension by smiling magnanimously.The two men magnanimously offered congratulations.
